{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10209v1", "title": "Continuity of differential operators for nonarchimedean Banach algebras", "summary": "Given a nonarchimedean field $K$ and a commutative, noetherian, Banach
$K$-algebra $A$, we study continuity of $K$-linear differential operators (in
the sense of Grothendieck) between finitely generated Banach $A$-modules. When
$K$ is of characteristic zero we show that every such operator is continuous if
and only if $A/\mathfrak{m}$ is a finite extension of $K$ for every maximal
ideal $\mathfrak{m}\subset A$.", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG,math.FA", "published": "2025-04-14T13:24:59Z"}
